p: 5-Bromobenzofuran-2-carbonyl chloride 9 (1 g, 3.8 mmol) was dissolved in dry acetone (30 ml), then added drop wisely to aqueous solution of equivalent amount of NaN 3 at 0 °C over 30 min. The formed precipitate was filtrated under vacuum and washed with pet. ether, then heated without purification in dry toluene for 1 h to produce the intermediate 11.
